title: Unexpected exception thrown for event 'interface tech.pegasys.teku.util.time.channels.TimeTickChannel.onTick' in handler 'tech.pegasys.teku.services.beaconchain.BeaconChainController'
body:
Getting this once per second

Thanks for the bug report.

We've got a ticket running for this issue, so we'll close this as a duplicate of #2562
